lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwNJ bYTy ibnu boihQw n pwr prY; pwrs prsY ibnu Dwq n kink hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as without embarking a ship, ocean cannot be crossed and without the touch of philosopher-stone, iron, copper or other metals cannot be turned into gold.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ jhwz ivc bYTy ibnwˆ pwr nhIˆ auqr skIdw qy pwrs prsy ibnwˆ DwqU sonwˆ nhIˆ bx sikAw krdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu gMgw n pwvn Awn jlu hY; nwr n Bqwir ibnu suqn Aink hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as no water is considered sacred other than the water of .river Ganges, and no child can be born without conjugal union of husband and wife.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ gMgw qoˆ ibnwˆ hor jl pivqR (puMn) kwrI nhIˆ hY qy Brqw ibnwˆ iesqRI bhu puqRvqI (vf pRvwrI) nhIˆ ho skdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu bIj boey inpjY n Dwn Dwrw; sIp sÍwNq bUMd ibnu mukqw n mwnk hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as without sowing seeds, no crop can grow and no pearl can be formed in an oyster unless the swati drop of rain falls on it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ bI bIijAwˆ ibnwˆ Dwn Dwrw AMn rwSI AMn dy bohl nhIˆ inpjY aupr skdy qy sÍwˆqI bUMd ibnwˆ is`pI ivcoˆ moqI mwink moqI srUp rqn nhIˆ pRgt ho skdw,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur crn srin gur Byty ibnu; jnm mrn myit jn n jn khY [538[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly without taking refuge and consecration of True Guru, there is no other method or force that can end the repeated cycle of birth and death. One who is without the divine word of the Guru cannot be called a human being.  (538)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr hI siqgurwˆ dy crxwˆ dI srx ByitAwˆ ibnwˆ jMmnw mrxw nhIˆ myitAw jw skdw Aqy s`c pu`Co qwˆ jn mnu`K nUM hI Asl ivc mnu`K nhIˆ ikhw jw skdw ]538]
